quote_first: “This is my first pass,” Wilson said. “East to west, at
quote_last: . We’re looking from the left-wing camera which is running at ninety-six frames per second. As you can see, my altitude is falling rapidly. Straight ahead is the main street of the target …”
title: The Andromeda Strain
author: Michael Crichton
